GoldCoast Class
===============

.. py:class:: GoldCoast

   A class for generating specific level segments representing the city of Gold Coast.

   .. method:: create()

      Static method to create Gold Coast-specific level segments using the LevelGenerator class.

      :returns: None

   Example usage:

   .. code-block:: python

      # Import the GoldCoast and LevelGenerator classes
      from your_module import GoldCoast, LevelGenerator

      # Example usage
      GoldCoast.create()
